Considering the great reviews on this place I really expected better.  I only had the volcano black rice, but it was not very good.  The rice tasted undercooked and the dish was pretty bland. It was strange how bland this dish was as most dishes in Spain lean towards the salty side, which is fine with me as I love salt.  The seafood on the dish was not the best quality and not all that tastey.  I've had much better meals in Spain.   Maybe if I got some other dish I would have been happier.
